summary: compiler plugin for Portable C Compiler (pcc)
name: compilerpcc.vim
description:
This is a compiler plugin for Portable C Compiler (pcc).

If you find any bug, please report it to xuhdev@gmail.com, or submit it on the
issue tracker:
https://bitbucket.org/xuhdev/compiler-pcc.vim/issues

Repository:
https://bitbucket.org/xuhdev/compiler-pcc.vim/src
install_details: Download the compiler-pcc.zip file and extract it to your vim runtime directory (~/.vim on UNIX/Linux and $VIM_INSTALLATION_FOLDER\vimfiles on windows).
